name: Elencos Don Rubino
additionalNotes: This cigar is the follow up of the limited edition inaugural cigar, although in limited production the Elencos Series will be available as a regular production cigar. The cigar is also blended with different tobacco as well, the wrapper is a limited harvested Habano tobacco grown in Brazil, fillers from Nicaragua held together with a binder grown in the Dominican Republic. The result is a rich medium to full bodied smoke that has the signature Cuban style of blending Ernesto Carrillo is known for, intense flavor but very well balanced and not just in your face strength.
